description:
NeoVamdemon`s forced DigiXros with MetalGreymon has made him much stronger. Taiki`s team searches for the legendary White Lopmon that holds the key to defeating NeoVamdemon, but when they can`t find it, Shoutmon lets himself be absorbed by NeoVamdemon to rescue MetalGreymon - and Lopmon follows him to save his own companions. Can their life-or-death efforts save MetalGreymon and defeat NeoVamdemon once and for all?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Die, Greymon! Shoutmon DX is Born
Shinuna Greymon! Shoutmon D Cross Tanjou
死ぬなグレイモン! シャウトモンDX(ディークロス)誕生
